titleStmt.title: A letter to Mr Richard Baxter occasioned by several injurious reflexions of his upon a treatise entituled Justificatio Paulina. For the better information of his weake or credulous readers. By Thomas Tully D.D.
titleStmt.author: Tully, T. (Thomas), 1620-1676.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Hen. Hall: for John Wilmot,

notesStmt.note: In answer to Richard Baxter's "Of the imputation of Christ's righteousness to believers"
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary Library.
